about_the_game:
The soundtrack to the point-and-click adventure Insights -  Maniac Vortex.
To fit the atmosphere inside the sanatorium the songs are all made in a dark theme and show the process of Thomas drifting more and more into madness. 

The names of the songs and the duration are not final and may change before release.
